subSections.title: Readings
Etymology
subSections.text:
{{ja-kanjitab|yomi=k|あひる}}

Uncommon alternative spelling of {{m|ja|家鴨|tr=ahiru||[[domestic duck]]}}.  See that entry for fuller details.

subSections.title: Noun
subSections.text:
{{ja-noun|あひる|アヒル}}

# {{altspell|nocap=1|lang=ja|家鴨}}: a [[domestic duck]] {{gl|the domesticated variety of [[mallard]]}}

subSections.title: Usage notes
subSections.text: This term ''ahiru'' appears to be the only usage of this kanji in modern Japanese.
